name: url-shortener-app
description: A React URL Shortener Web Application with comprehensive logging middleware

scripts.build: cd "Frontend Test Submission" && npm run build
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd "Frontend Test Submission" && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run server" "cd \"Frontend Test Submission\" && npm start"
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && cd "Frontend Test Submission" && npm test

author: Affordmed Technologies
